content.rendered:
The High School will be administering the PSAT exam on Saturday, October 26, 2024.

The deadline to register and remit payment is Monday, September 16th by 12:00pm. Walk-ins and late registrations cannot be accommodated.  If payment is not received by 12PM by the deadline, an exam will not be ordered for the student.  

Payment DOES NOT mean you have registered for the exam.   You must also register for the exam. 

  • To REGISTER for the exam, please use the link to register through the High School:  https://forms.office.com/r/jDsfC7tQ73

  • To PAY for the exam, please use the link below or scan the QR code for My School Bucks: https://www.myschoolbucks.com/ver2/prdembd?ref=ZZ5Y6FCD6K2TMPL_ZZ609DNRX6YUM94

Full details about the PSAT can be found in this letter:  

PSAT Letter October 2024.


If you have any questions regarding the PSAT exam, please contact the Counseling Center at (518) 587-6690, extension 33351 or 33310.
